page.title: 20THANKS TO THE FOLLOWING
page.content:
Contributions have been included from:-
Mrs. Diane Ayerst, Dr. Gordon Ayerst, Mr. Charlie Brownsel, Mrs. Sherriff, and the children of St. John's School, Digswell. Contributions from the Children of Homerswood School Welwyn Garden City were compiled with the help of:- Mr. White, Mr. Davies of Tewin Hill Farm, Mr. Marsh the Butcher at Digswell, Mr. Mably and his son Louis at Welwyn Garden City Fire Station and the Staff of the Cowper Arms Public House Digswell. Research and contributions are also included by children from Creswick School and Panshanger School. Thanks to Mr.Paul Whyatt for taking the slides.
